message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $7500?
I understand you're looking to stay within budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $8500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $8000 for the product. I hope this meets within your acceptable range.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! However, I'm not quite ready to accept $8000. I'm willing to meet you at $9000. What do you think?
